skills.name: Brute Force
skills.description: Used for breaking, lifting, forcing mechanical devices open.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 to checks involving lifting or forcing open doors/hatches.
proficiency_levels.Expert: +2 bonus when breaking or bending reinforced materials.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can break through heavy machinery or barriers without injury.

skills.name: Industrial Combat
skills.description: Proficiency in heavy weapons, hammers, or mechanical-powered melee attacks.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Advantage on disarming enemies using industrial tools/weapons.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Heavy weapon strikes can stagger enemies, reducing their next action.

skills.name: Steam Endurance
skills.description: The ability to resist extreme heat, handle heavy machinery, or survive industrial hazards.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 resistance against heat and smoke-related damage.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can work longer in hazardous environments without fatigue.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Immune to minor steam burns and resistant to intense heat exposure.

skills.name: Precision Engineering
skills.description: Fine motor skills for repairing, modifying, and assembling intricate devices.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Can modify devices for temporary bonuses (e.g., increased output).
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can disassemble and reassemble complex mechanisms quickly.

skills.name: Aether Reflexes
skills.description: Dodging magical surges, avoiding steam explosions, and reacting to sudden mechanical failures.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Advantage on evasion when reacting to an explosion or spell surge.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can predict and completely negate a minor magical hazard once per day.

skills.name: Tinkering & Traps
skills.description: The skill of disabling mechanical locks, bypassing security systems, or setting traps.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 to checks related to lockpicking or trap disarming.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can set up simple mechanical traps within 5 minutes.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can bypass advanced security systems or create specialized gadgets.

skills.name: Gunplay & Ranged Combat
skills.description: Proficiency with firearms, clockwork crossbows, and steam-powered ranged weapons.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Reload times reduced; can fire twice per action.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Critical hits on ranged attacks deal bonus explosive damage.

skills.name: Overclock Control
skills.description: Determines how well you can sustain pushing your body and machines beyond limits before burning out.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Can push limits longer before suffering exhaustion.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Immune to first instance of overclock burnout per long rest.

skills.name: Toxin & Smoke Resistance
skills.description: Resisting alchemy fumes, steam-related hazards, and industrial contaminants.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 resistance to poison or toxic fumes.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can function in hazardous areas without penalty for longer.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Immune to weak toxins and resistant to lethal industrial gases.

skills.name: Schematic Analysis
skills.description: Understanding blueprints, magical circuitry, and reverse-engineering lost technology.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Can reverse-engineer devices twice as fast.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can instantly recognize and understand advanced tech or runes.

skills.name: Runic Studies
skills.description: Knowledge of ancient grimoires, spell inscriptions, and decoding arcane formulas.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 to checks related to deciphering runes.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can identify magical properties of objects by touch.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can inscribe temporary runes that enhance weapons or armor.

skills.name: Foresight & Instincts
skills.description: Predicting enemy actions, sensing danger, or reacting to magical interference.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Advantage on perception checks in combat scenarios.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can instinctively dodge the first attack in combat once per long rest.

skills.name: Influence Protocols
skills.description: Negotiating with merchants, engineers, or AI-driven automatons.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 to persuasion when dealing with tech-based entities.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can convince neutral constructs to follow simple commands.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Once per long rest, can override a constructâ€™s behavior for 1 minute.

skills.name: Command Presence
skills.description: Inspiring allies, leading a squad, or intimidating enemies through sheer authority.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Allies within 10 feet gain +1 to attack rolls.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can force one enemy to hesitate or flee once per long rest.

skills.name: Arcane Diplomacy
skills.description: Convincing mystical beings, spirits, or intelligent machines to cooperate.

proficiency_levels.Expert: Can negotiate minor favors from magical beings.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can forge temporary pacts with magical creatures for short-term benefits.

skills.name: Aether Mechanics
skills.description: The ability to merge magic with technology, create enchanted weapons, and modify spell-powered devices.

proficiency_levels.Novice: +1 to checks involving magical tech integration.
proficiency_levels.Expert: Can enchant weapons or armor with minor magical properties.
proficiency_levels.Mastery: Can create complex magical devices or enchantments.
